files.name: basic-list.component.html
files.content: <daff-list role="list"> <daff-list-item>Basic list item 1</daff-list-item> <daff-list-item>Basic list item 2</daff-list-item> <daff-list-item>Basic list item 3</daff-list-item> </daff-list>

files.name: basic-list.component.ts
files.content: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ // tslint:disable-next-line:component-selector selector: 'basic-list', templateUrl: './basic-list.component.html', }) export class BasicListComponent {}

files.name: basic-list.module.ts
files.content: import { NgModule } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { BasicListComponent } from './basic-list.component'; import { DaffListModule } from '@daffodil/design'; @NgModule({ declarations: [ BasicListComponent ], imports: [ CommonModule, DaffListModule ], exports: [ BasicListComponent ] }) export class BasicListModule { }
